short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the news feed on facebook.com & the new item indicator on twitter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This small lightweight extension hides the newsfeed on facebook.com by default and lets you show it whenever you like. It also hides the "new item" bar on Twitter, giving you more control over your usage of both sites.
